definition[0]: a fairly slow dance with a regular pattern of three beats
definition[1]: a piece of music intended for this type of dance
example[1]: They waltzed elegantly around the dance floor.
definition[3]: to walk somewhere calmly and confidently – used to show disapproval
example[2]: Jeff just waltzed up to the bar and helped himself to a drink.
example[3]: She can’t waltz in here and start making changes.
